name: Sky Fighter: 2D Endless Runner
description:
Sky Fighter is a 2D Endless Runner game.

  • You control a plane using up and down arrow keys.
  • Avoid or destroy the enemy planes using space bar and shoot them.
  • After destroying enemies you will get random number of ammos at random time.
  • You gain more points for surviving longer.
  • Enemies will appear faster when you gain more points.
  • You have 3 lives in the beginning; Game over when you lose all of your lives
